DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to assess the efficacy and safety of multiple infusions of conivaptan in subjects with euvolemic or hypervolemic hyponatremia
DOC.brief_title: Study of Efficacy & Safety for 3 Infusion Regimens of IV Conivaptan in Subjects With Euvolemic or Hypervolemic Hyponatremia
DOC.criteria: Euvolemic or hypervolemic (edematous) based on clinical presentation Serum sodium between 115 and 130mEq/L at baseline Clinical presentation of volume depletion or dehydration
